title: Warriors parade gets wild
description:
The Warriors parade was lit. Draymond had a lot to say, but it was Klay that stole the show. Find out if we’ll be seeing more of the parades in the bay area or if this is the last of the dynasty. Day two of the contract impasse with Kyrie Irving, find out if it’s Nets or bust for the superstar. Plus, Knicks rumors are always in full force in the offseason, but haven’t Knicks fans learned their lesson? The guys talk about how they should taper expectations over the next few weeks. Also, the Orlando Magic still don’t know who they are picking number 1 overall. Listen as the guys breakdown the top picks in the draft and who the Magic should be taking.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
